00020 #ifndef _RTAI_NUCLEUS_SYSCALL_H
00021 #define _RTAI_NUCLEUS_SYSCALL_H
00022 
00023 #include <nucleus/asm/syscall.h>
00024 
00025 /* RTAI/fusion multiplexer syscall. */
00026 #define __xn_sys_mux    555
00027 /* RTAI/fusion nucleus syscalls. */
00028 #define __xn_sys_attach     0   /* muxid = xnshadow_attach_interface(magic,infp) */
00029 #define __xn_sys_detach     1   /* xnshadow_detach_interface(muxid) */
00030 #define __xn_sys_sync       2   /* xnshadow_sync(&syncflag) */
00031 #define __xn_sys_migrate    3   /* switched = xnshadow_relax/harden() */
00032 #define __xn_sys_barrier    4   /* started = xnshadow_wait_barrier(&entry,&cookie) */
00033 #ifdef CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_TIMESTAMPS
00034 #define __xn_sys_timestamps 5   /* xnpod_get_timestamps(&timestamps) */
00035 #endif /* CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_TIMESTAMPS */
00036 
00037 typedef struct xnsysinfo {
00038 
00039     unsigned long long cpufreq; /* CPU frequency */
00040     unsigned long tickval;      /* Tick duration (ns) */
00041 
00042 } xnsysinfo_t;
00043 
00044 typedef struct xninquiry {
00045 
00046     char name[32];
00047     int prio;
00048     unsigned long status;
00049     void *khandle;
00050     void *uhandle;
00051 
00052 } xninquiry_t;
00053 
00054 #ifdef __KERNEL__
00055 
00056 struct task_struct;
00057 
00058 #define XNARCH_MAX_SYSENT 255
00059 
00060 typedef struct _xnsysent {
00061 
00062     int (*svc)(struct task_struct *task,
00063                struct pt_regs *regs);
00064 
00065 /* Syscall must run into the Linux domain. */
00066 #define __xn_flag_lostage    0x1
00067 /* Syscall must run into the RTAI domain. */
00068 #define __xn_flag_histage    0x2
00069 /* Shadow syscall; caller must be mapped. */
00070 #define __xn_flag_shadow     0x4
00071 /* Context-agnostic syscall. */
00072 #define __xn_flag_anycall    0x0
00073 /* Short-hand for shadow initializing syscall. */
00074 #define __xn_flag_init       __xn_flag_lostage
00075 /* Short-hand for pure shadow syscall in RTAI space. */
00076 #define __xn_flag_regular   (__xn_flag_shadow|__xn_flag_histage)
00077 
00078     u_long flags;
00079 
00080 } xnsysent_t;
00081 
00082 extern int nkgkptd;
00083 
00084 #define xnshadow_ptd(t)    ((t)->ptd[nkgkptd])
00085 #define xnshadow_thread(t) ((xnthread_t *)xnshadow_ptd(t))
00086 
00087 #endif /* __KERNEL__ */
00088 
00089 #endif /* !_RTAI_NUCLEUS_SYSCALL_H */
